code: import axios from"axios";import{onGlobalSuccess,onGlobalError}from"../services/serviceHelper";var getCategories=function getCategories(){var config={method:"GET",url:"https://localhost:50001/api/category",withCredentials:true,crossdomain:true,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};return axios(config).then(onGlobalSuccess).catch(onGlobalError);};var categoryService={getCategories:getCategories};export default categoryService;
